thisis.text: This is Disha calling from SME Corner. Am I speaking to

welcome1.text: Welcome to SMECorner, we are happy to see you as part of our family & hope to serve you at our best.This call-in respect to the Business Loan  disbursed by us on

welcome2.text: The disbursed Loan Details are as follows. Loan has been disbursed to you by

welcome5.text: months. Your monthly EMI will be of Rupees

welcome6.text: and first EMI will start on

welcome7.text: I hope the details are clear to you

maintainBalance.text: Request you to kindly maintain a sufficient balance in account on

greatDay.text: Thank you and have a great day

concern.text: We have noted your concern and our executive will call you back regrading the same

repeat.text: I hope you agree with the information provided or would you like me to repeat
